snp3.6:510: "Kaṅkhī vecikicchī āgamaṁ,Pañhe pucchituṁ abhikaṅkhamāno;Tesantakaro bhavāhi pañhe me puṭṭho,Anupubbaṁ anudhammaṁ byākarohi me".
snp3.6:511: "Dūrato āgatosi sabhiya,Pañhe pucchituṁ abhikaṅkhamāno;Tesantakaro bhavāmi pañhe te puṭṭho,Anupubbaṁ anudhammaṁ byākaromi te.
snp3.6:512: Puccha maṁ sabhiya pañhaṁ,Yaṁ kiñci manasicchasi;Tassa tasseva pañhassa,Ahaṁ antaṁ karomi te"ti.
snp3.6:513: "Kiṁpattinamāhu bhikkhunaṁ,Sorataṁ kena kathañca dantamāhu;Buddhoti kathaṁ pavuccati,Puṭṭho me bhagavā byākarohi".
snp3.6:514: "Pajjena katena attanā,Parinibbānagato vitiṇṇakaṅkho;Vibhavañca bhavañca vippahāya,Vusitavā khīṇapunabbhavo sa bhikkhu.
snp3.6:515: Sabbattha upekkhako satimā,Na so hiṁsati kañci sabbaloke;Tiṇṇo samaṇo anāvilo,Ussadā yassa na santi sorato so.
snp3.6:516: Yassindriyāni bhāvitāni,Ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā ca sabbaloke;Nibbijjha imaṁ parañca lokaṁ,Kālaṁ kaṅkhati bhāvito sa danto.
snp3.6:517: Kappāni viceyya kevalāni,Saṁsāraṁ dubhayaṁ cutūpapātaṁ;Vigatarajamanaṅgaṇaṁ visuddhaṁ,Pattaṁ jātikhayaṁ tamāhu buddhan"ti.
snp3.6:518: "Kiṁpattinamāhu brāhmaṇaṁ,Samaṇaṁ kena kathañca nhātakoti;Nāgoti kathaṁ pavuccati,Puṭṭho me bhagavā byākarohi".
snp3.6:519: "Bāhitvā sabbapāpakāni,Vimalo sādhusamāhito ṭhitatto;Saṁsāramaticca kevalī so,Asito tādi pavuccate sa brahmā.
snp3.6:520: Samitāvi pahāya puññapāpaṁ,Virajo ñatvā imaṁ parañca lokaṁ;Jātimaraṇaṁ upātivatto,Samaṇo tādi pavuccate tathattā.
snp3.6:521: Ninhāya sabbapāpakāni,Ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā ca sabbaloke;Devamanussesu kappiyesu,Kappaṁ neti tamāhu nhātakoti.
snp3.6:522: Āguṁ na karoti kiñci loke,Sabbasaṁyoge visajja bandhanāni;Sabbattha na sajjatī vimutto,Nāgo tādi pavuccate tathattā"ti.
snp3.6:523: "Kaṁ khettajinaṁ vadanti buddhā,Kusalaṁ kena kathañca paṇḍitoti;Muni nāma kathaṁ pavuccati,Puṭṭho me bhagavā byākarohi".
snp3.6:524: "Khettāni viceyya kevalāni,Dibbaṁ mānusakañca brahmakhettaṁ;Sabbakhettamūlabandhanā pamutto,Khettajino tādi pavuccate tathattā.
snp3.6:525: Kosāni viceyya kevalāni,Dibbaṁ mānusakañca brahmakosaṁ;Sabbakosamūlabandhanā pamutto,Kusalo tādi pavuccate tathattā.
snp3.6:526: Dubhayāni viceyya paṇḍarāni,Ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā ca suddhipañño;Kaṇhaṁ sukkaṁ upātivatto,Paṇḍito tādi pavuccate tathattā.
snp3.6:527: Asatañca satañca ñatvā dhammaṁ,Ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā ca sabbaloke;Devamanussehi pūjanīyo,Saṅgaṁ jālamaticca so munī"ti.
snp3.6:528: "Kiṁpattinamāhu vedaguṁ,Anuviditaṁ kena kathañca viriyavāti;Ājāniyo kinti nāma hoti,Puṭṭho me bhagavā byākarohi".
snp3.6:529: "Vedāni viceyya kevalāni,Samaṇānaṁ yānidhatthi brāhmaṇānaṁ;Sabbavedanāsu vītarāgo,Sabbaṁ vedamaticca vedagū so.
snp3.6:530: Anuvicca papañcanāmarūpaṁ,Ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā ca rogamūlaṁ;Sabbarogamūlabandhanā pamutto,Anuvidito tādi pavuccate tathattā.
snp3.6:531: Virato idha sabbapāpakehi,Nirayadukkhaṁ aticca viriyavāso;So vīriyavā padhānavā,Dhīro tādi pavuccate tathattā.
snp3.6:532: Yassassu lunāni bandhanāni,Ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā ca saṅgamūlaṁ;Sabbasaṅgamūlabandhanā pamutto,Ājāniyo tādi pavuccate tathattā"ti.
snp3.6:533: "Kiṁpattinamāhu sottiyaṁ,Ariyaṁ kena kathañca caraṇavāti;Paribbājako kinti nāma hoti,Puṭṭho me bhagavā byākarohi".
snp3.6:534: "Sutvā sabbadhammaṁ abhiññāya loke,Sāvajjānavajjaṁ yadatthi kiñci;Abhibhuṁ akathaṅkathiṁ vimuttaṁ,Anighaṁ sabbadhimāhu sottiyoti.
snp3.6:535: Chetvā āsavāni ālayāni,Vidvā so na upeti gabbhaseyyaṁ;Saññaṁ tividhaṁ panujja paṅkaṁ,Kappaṁ neti tamāhu ariyoti.
snp3.6:536: Yo idha caraṇesu pattipatto,Kusalo sabbadā ājānāti dhammaṁ;Sabbattha na sajjati vimuttacitto,Paṭighā yassa na santi caraṇavā so.
snp3.6:537: Dukkhavepakkaṁ yadatthi kammaṁ,Uddhamadho tiriyaṁ vāpi majjhe;Paribbājayitvā pariññacārī,Māyaṁ mānamathopi lobhakodhaṁ;Pariyantamakāsi nāmarūpaṁ,Taṁ paribbājakamāhu pattipattan"ti.
snp3.6:538: "Yāni ca tīṇi yāni ca saṭṭhi,Samaṇappavādasitāni bhūripañña;Saññakkharasaññanissitāni,Osaraṇāni vineyya oghatamagā.
snp3.6:539: Antagūsi pāragū dukkhassa,Arahāsi sammāsambuddho khīṇāsavaṁ taṁ maññe;Jutimā mutimā pahūtapañño,Dukkhassantakara atāresi maṁ.
snp3.6:540: Yaṁ me kaṅkhītamaññāsi,Vicikicchā maṁ tārayi namo te;Muni monapathesu pattipatta,Akhila ādiccabandhu soratosi.
snp3.6:541: Yā me kaṅkhā pure āsi,Taṁ me byākāsi cakkhumā;Addhā munīsi sambuddho,Natthi nīvaraṇā tava.
snp3.6:542: Upāyāsā ca te sabbe,Viddhastā vinaḷīkatā;Sītibhūto damappatto,Dhitimā saccanikkamo.
snp3.6:543: Tassa te nāganāgassa,Mahāvīrassa bhāsato;Sabbe devānumodanti,Ubho nāradapabbatā.
snp3.6:544: Namo te purisājañña,Namo te purisuttama;Sadevakasmiṁ lokasmiṁ,Natthi te paṭipuggalo.
snp3.6:545: Tuvaṁ buddho tuvaṁ satthā,Tuvaṁ mārābhibhū muni;Tuvaṁ anusaye chetvā,Tiṇṇo tāresi maṁ pajaṁ.
snp3.6:546: Upadhī te samatikkantā,Āsavā te padālitā;Sīhosi anupādāno,Pahīnabhayabheravo.
snp3.6:547: Puṇḍarīkaṁ yathā vaggu,Toye na upalimpati;Evaṁ puññe ca pāpe ca,Ubhaye tvaṁ na limpasi;Pāde vīra pasārehi,Sabhiyo vandati satthuno"ti.
